ActCanada Education Savings Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Education Savings Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA EDUCATION SAVINGS REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that federal and provincial education savings incentives are repaid proportionally in cases where there is an investment loss in an Registered Education Savings Plan (RESP); (2) ensure that ineligible transfers of provincial incentives do not result in the repayment of federal education savings incentives; (3) clarify the amounts of federal education savings incentives and earnings to be paid in an Educational Assistance Payment (EAP), to account for cases where an education savings incentive in the RESP cannot be in-cluded in the EAP; (4) further clarify the requirement to repay the Canada Education Savings Grant (CESG) paid in respect of contributions that were withdrawn; (5) address language inconsistencies and remove subjective language to address concerns raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; and (6) address discrepancies between the French and English names of the Regulations.
